ComicInfo.Summary:
The stakes couldn’t be higher as Kestrel closes in for the kill! Sentenced to death in the ruins of New York City, our heroes fight for their lives against an onslaught of viral terrors. Can they recover the key to saving humanity? And will they survive long enough to use it? Don’t miss the thrilling penultimate issue of the summer’s most talked about sci-fi saga—THE WEATHERMAN VOL. 2!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Nathan Fox | 1-2 | B | Cover B | Andrew Robinson | 3 | C | Cover C | Daniel Warren Johnson & Mike Spicer | 4 |
